Complete remission ( CR ) , CR incomplete platelet count recovery ( CRp ) , overall remission rate ( ORR ) , event-free survival ( EFS ) , leukemia-free survival ( LFS ) percentage participant allogeneic hematopoietic stem cell transplant ( HSCT ) also compare treatment arm .
